description: Defines required predicates, sets, and formalized constraints for the Automated Theorem Proving Environment (ATE) used by ACPE V2.0.

required_predicates.name: Satisfies
required_predicates.purpose: Checks if context satisfies the antecedent of a Veto Rule R_i.

required_predicates.name: Veto
required_predicates.purpose: Checks if the Ruleset prevents P-01 Pass under given Context.

required_predicates.name: Domain
required_predicates.purpose: Maps a rule to the domains it covers for CT.

axiomatic_constraints.RNC_T_NonContradiction: ∀ i, j ∈ P', i ≠ j : ¬ (Satisfies(ω, R_i) ∧ Satisfies(ω, R_j))
